attributes.action: Protect DSA (Disabled Students Allowance) Funding for all Support services.
attributes.additional_details:
Consultation on targeting funding for disabled students in Higher Education from 2016/17 onwards - Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
https://goo.gl/zUjwz2

Government confirms cuts to Disabled Students’ Allowance - Times Higher Education
https://goo.gl/13GZ8V

Disabled Students' Allowances - parliament.uk
http://goo.gl/AA0clk

Disabled Students’ Allowances cuts: Britain needs to ensure disabled students have the same chances as able students - The Independant
http://goo.gl/66cyQQ
attributes.background:
In 2016/17 changes have been proposed to change the way Disabled Student Allowance is funded. 
Non-Medical Support will now be funded by Universities instead of the government, but they will receive no extra funding.
Many fear this will lead to a cut in services which are vital to these students.
